strong.span: Can’t make it to the game? No worries!!
You can now follow all Okarche Basketball home games
through the Score Vision Fan App!!

font.b: Or watch games being live streamed @ okarchewarriors.tv!!

span.b: “click” The link above to access Okarche Public School’s Storefront through Shutterfly.
Okarche Public Schools will receive 8% of every order placed through this link!

span.span: All Okarche Public School Facilities are 24/7 Smoke/Tobacco Free!
